metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20216 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Privoxy in versions before 3.0.31. A memory leak that occurs when decompression fails unexpectedly may lead to a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: privoxy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
